name: Alice in Wonderland (itch) (andreinik)
description:
Total fan remake of the classical adventure game Alice in Wonderland by Windham Classics (c) released in 1985 for Apple II & C64. 

Travel with Alice through the fantasy world created by Lewis Carrol, meet and interact with well-known characters and try to go back home!

Key game's capabilities:

  • Large world (more than fully unique 180 screens)
  • Totally remastered arts with hand-made graphics and manual only animation
  • Deep interaction with every NPC: dialog system, items exchange, riddles, songs
  • Interaction with the world: use, eat, drop various items
  • Run, crawl, jump, swim and fly to reach hidden areas

Beta version 0.2.0  just released! 40 of 180 screens available.

Controls:

Left/Right arrows - Run left and right 
Up/Down arrows  - Climb up and down / stay to knees
Left/Right arrows + Space - Jump
Space - Enter the door/open parasol while falling
Z - Open actions menu/apply selected item
Esc - Close actions menu
